title: Bloodlust
creator_credit: Jon Hewitt, Richard Wolstencroft and Windhover Productions
brief_description: The most controversial and acclaimed cult hit since “Mad Max.” Banned in seven countries including Britain, “Bloodlust” is the tale of three modern day vampires on a bullet-riddled rollercoaster to hell. Winner Finalist Award “Best Film” Worldfest Housten, Texas. Starring John Stuart Wallace, Kelly Chapman, Robert James O’Neill and Phil Motherwell. Music by Revolting Cocks, Pailhead, Lead into Gold and 100 Homo DJ’s.
